warnings: WARNINGS: Consult a physician for use in children under 12 years of age. IF PREGNANT OR BREAST-FEEDING , ask a health care professional before use. KEEP OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN. In case of overdose (or accidental ingestion) get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away. Do not use if TAMPER EVIDENT seal is broken or missing.
dosage_administration: DIRECTIONS: Adults & children above 12 years: Mix 3 parts water to 1 part juice. Add 6 drops Hydrate II to 8oz mixture or add 30 drops to a quart mixture. Drink 4 - 8 oz glasses daily between meals. Drink Hydrate/water mixture for 6 days and then only water for 1 day. Repeat. After 8 weeks begin drinking more pure water and less Hydrate/water mixture.
indications: USES: To help maintain a healthy level of hydration in the body.**
